about_the_game:
Unlock the heart of Europe as you dive into the enchanting stories behind Germany’s iconic landmarks. Savor the rich flavors of its diverse regional cuisines, and immerse yourself in the timeless traditions that have shaped one of Europe’s most captivating nations. From the majestic Brandenburg Gate to the breathtaking vistas of the Bavarian Alps, every moment unveils a new layer of Germany’s cultural tapestry. Let each step take you deeper into history, where the past comes alive through interactive experiences. Feel the warmth of the people, connect with their vibrant heritage, and embrace an adventure that stirs the soul. Breathe in the aroma of traditional sausages at Marienplatz! Your German adventure starts here!

This Collector's Edition includes:

🔎 Explore Germany's Iconic Landmarks!

From the historic Brandenburg Gate to the snow-capped Bavarian Alps, enjoy a fully interactive experience of Germany’s renowned sites. Visit fairy-tale castles like Neuschwanstein, wander through the medieval streets of Rothenburg, and stroll by the serene banks of the Rhine River—all without leaving your home!

🔎 Puzzles & Hidden Collectibles!

Each landmark and city you visit is filled with puzzles that challenge your mind while enhancing your understanding of German culture. Discover hidden collectibles that unlock secret stories, trivia, and extra content about Germany's most famous sites and lesser-known gems!

🔎 Bremen Wish!

After completing the main game, unlock a chapter where you can make a wish at the legendary Town Musicians of Bremen statue. This chapter offers new puzzles, fun surprises, and an additional exploration of Germany's unique folklore and traditions!

🔎 Culinary and Cultural Delights!

Experience Germany’s diverse food culture as you journey through different regions. From savoring sausages at Marienplatz to tasting fresh pretzels and rich Black Forest cake, every stop brings a new culinary delight! Along the way, immerse yourself in vibrant festivals, music, and local traditions that have shaped Germany’s cultural heritage.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space

short_description: Unveil the beauty and history of Germany, the land of poets and thinkers! Explore stunning castles, bustling cities, and captivating cultural treasures.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Russian
*languages with full audio support
